title: Linux split Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux split command and its practical applications. Learn how to split files into multiple parts, customize the split options, and efficiently manage your text data.

meta.title: Linux split Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux split command and its practical applications. Learn how to split files into multiple parts, customize the split options, and efficiently manage your text data.
meta.keywords: Linux, split command, file splitting, text processing, text editing, command line, file management
